title: Placements wtf
body: I was bronze 3 last season as I started really late into season 6. I tried really hard to not get bronze this season and I went 10-0. I go into the end game screen expecting to get high bronze/low silver. Then I get bronze 4, why?

replies.body: how do ppl win 7/10 place gold 4 but i win 8/10 and i get placed s4? i was ranked higher last season.
Could be random, or they could be playing people with much lower mmr.

> [{quoted}](name=StealthDude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M6XAahyV,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-09T06:52:09.343+0000)
>
> I was bronze 3 last season as I started really late into season 6. I tried really hard to not get bronze this season and I went 10-0. I go into the end game screen expecting to get high bronze/low silver. Then I get bronze 4, why?

lolz! I was bronze 3 last season also and went 2-8 in placements and got bronze 3 :P

Bang a gong

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

Well at least I have high mmr, I skipped bronze 3 from my bronze 4 promos and now I'm bronze 2.

> While the preseason was shorter this year than ever before, your 2017 ranked adventure will begin with a fresh set of ten placement matches in both Solo/Duo and Flex. Your preseason ratings influence where youâ€™ll land, but most of you should expect to start your climb lower than where you finished last season.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2017-ranked-season-kicks
I know it's based off previous mmr as well but it's not right that I get a lower rank with 10 wins in placements.
